projects.name: iNotebook
highlights: Built a secure, full-stack note-taking app using MERN stack and Bootstrap for responsiveness.
Implemented JWT-based authentication, ensuring data confidentiality and session integrity.
Used React Context API for efficient global state management and enhanced app scalability.

projects.name: Node-Rest-Shop
highlights: Developed a backend shopping application using Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, and REST APIs.
Integrated bcrypt and JWT tokens to implement robust authentication and data security mechanisms.
Handled dynamic and complex data using MongoDB to ensure high performance and data integrity.

projects.name: TextUtils-React
highlights: Built a React.js web app for text manipulation (e.g., case conversion, word count).
Added responsive design using Bootstrap and implemented dark mode for UI customization.
Delivered seamless user experience with instant text analysis features.
